apple.description: An Apple. The reason snakes lost their legs
apple.name: Apple

sword.description: A mighty Sword King Arthur would be proud of
sword.name: Sword

money.description: You can buy stuff with this.
money.name: Money

key_wooden_chest.description: Key that looks like it fits in a 'Wooden Chest'
key_wooden_chest.name: Wooden Key

co_west_d_key.description: Key that opens door to the garden 'Shed'
co_west_d_key.name: Shed Key

ba_north_d_key.description: Key that opens the door at the bottom of the staircase
ba_north_d_key.name: Basement Key

ha_west_d_key.description: Key that unlocks a door in the 'Hall'
ha_west_d_key.name: Hall Key

be_north_d_key.description: Mysterious Key. What will it open?
be_north_d_key.name: Mystery Key

co_south_d.name: Cell Door
co_south_d.description: A 'Cell Door' made of sturdy iron bars. Impossible to open without the correct key.

co_west_d.name: Shed Door
co_west_d.description: 'Shed Door' made of wood. There must be a key to unlock it somewhere.

co_north_d.name: Large Wooden Door
co_north_d.description: A giant wooden door that leads into the mansion.

ba_north_d.name: Basement Door
ba_north_d.description: Behind this 'Basement Door' the cellar room is located (duh).

ha_east_d.name: Arch
ha_east_d.description: An arch that connects the Hall with the Staircase.

fo_north_d.name: Bathroom Door
fo_north_d.description: A regular 'Bathroom Door' leading to the place where one can do one's special business.

be_west_d.name: Bedroom Door
be_west_d.description: 'Bedroom Door' that connects the bathroom directly to the bedroom.

be_north_d.name: Bedroom Window
be_north_d.description: You see a 'Bedroom Window' with sharp broken glass shards. Taking a closer look you see a tiny lock on the handle.

ch_south.description: Thick Iron Bars prevent anything but mosquitoes from coming through.

ch_west.description: Thick Iron Bars prevent anything but mosquitoes from coming through.

ch_east.description: Thick Iron Bars prevent anything but mosquitoes from coming through.

sh_west.description: A wooden wall with a workbench in front of it. A bunch of gardening tools are lying around on it.

co_east.description: A high wall with a lot of windows giving an idea of the size of the mansion.

ba_west.description: An old mossy stone wall. A 'Safe' is built into the wall.

sh_north.description: A wooden wall with a cabinet hanging on it.

fo_west.description: You can see the entrance to the mansion, but the big door has a heavy lock on it that you will not be able to break.

st_east.description: A wall with a window in it. Outside you see the outside you are desperately trying to reach.

ha_north.description: A grand staircase leading to the upper floors of the building, however it is completely blocked by debris. You won't be able to go up there.

st_north.description: A wall with a window in it. Outside you see the outside you are desperately trying to reach.

bt_west.description: A tiled wall with the 'Toilet' in front of a window showing you a beautiful sunny day.

be_east.description: A big bed is standing on this side of the room with a 'Nightstand' right next to it.

bt_north.description: A tiled wall with a bathtub in front of it.

fr_west.description: Vast open fields allow you to escape from this place.

fr_east.description: Vast open fields allow you to escape from this place.

fr_north.description: Vast open fields allow you to escape from this place.

staircase.description: A staircase that leads down into what seems to be the basement.
staircase.name: Staircase

freedom.description: You are Free! Congratulations, you finished the game :)
freedom.name: Freedom

merchant_henry.description: A friendly looking Merchant. You can trade with him.
merchant_henry.name: Henry the Merchant
merchant_henry.text: Hello, I'm Henry the Merchant. can I interest you in some of my wares?

wooden_chest.description: Old 'wooden chest' that might contain something for the door.
wooden_chest.name: Wooden Chest

fountain.description: A beautiful water 'fountain' glistening in the moonlight. Is there something inside?
fountain.name: Fountain

cabinet.description: Wooden 'Cabinet' hanging on the wall, probably used to store garden utensils.
cabinet.name: Cabinet

flush_tank.description: A regular looking 'Flush Tank' attached to the 'Toilet'. The lid seems to be a little lose.
flush_tank.name: Flush Tank

toilet.description: A disgusting looking 'Toilet' that looks exactly like the place someone would try to flush down cocaine, when the police comes knocking. Attached to it is a regular 'Flush Tank'.
toilet.name: Toilet

nightstand.description: Wooden 'Nightstand' with a small lamp on top and a closed drawer.
nightstand.name: Nightstand
